participant_1.background:
I'm a passionate artist who's been through a lot in love, but I keep drawing and creating because it's my passion.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
I once got food poisoning from a cheeseburger at a diner in the Midwest.
i am a volunteer firefighter.
I enjoy reading books to distract myself from pain.

participant_2.background:
I wish I could fly my model airplane without being afraid of crashing it.
i worry about money even though i am in high school.
I get by with my coffee and the books I read to fill the time between work and solitude.
I lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
my feet are size six women s.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Not great, I just lost my job and had to move my family out of our house.
I am so sorry to hear that, I can only imagine how hard that must be.
It is very tough, but I am trying to stay positive and focus on the future.
That is the best attitude to have, I am sure things will get better.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
That sounds nice, I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but I am really into historical fiction right now.
Oh, I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I really liked the Pillars of the Earth by Ken Follett, and the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
Those are both great books! I have read both of them too.
Oh, that's awesome! I am glad you liked them.
Yeah, they are really good. I am looking forward to the next book in the Outlander series.
Me too! It is supposed to be coming out soon.
